    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        public void initialise()
        Setup your Scene in this method. Create any DisplayableObjects and AnimatedObjects and add them to the Scene.

        Call super.initialise() to setup the framework's default Camera and projection settings.

        Overrides:
        initialise in class Scene
        See Also:
        DisplayableObject, AnimatedObject, Camera, Input

      • globalLighting

        protected void globalLighting()
        Override default global lighting.
        Overrides:
        globalLighting in class Scene
        See Also:
        Scene.lights()

      • reshape

        protected void reshape()
        Override default reshape function. Called during every iteration of Scene.draw(). Use this method to handle resizing objects based on your window size.
        Overrides:
        reshape in class Scene
        See Also:
        Scene.getObject(String), projection()

      • setInitWindowSize

        protected void setInitWindowSize()
        Override default initial window size (600x400). Adjust variables in super class to change values.
        Overrides:
        setInitWindowSize in class Scene
        See Also:
        Scene.setup()

      • projection

        protected void projection()
        Override projection properties here. Remove call to super.projection() and replace with perspective mode.
        Overrides:
        projection in class Scene
        See Also:
        PApplet.perspective(float, float, float, float), PApplet.ortho(float, float, float, float, float, float), PApplet.frustum(float, float, float, float, float, float)
